info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 2:33PM MDT until May 24 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROOSEVELT AND NORTHEASTERN CHAVES COUNTIES... At 233 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Kenna, or 37 miles southwest of Portales, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dora, Milnesand, Pep and Kenna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland.
